My brother and I are very lucky that our grandmother, Lydia Alekseevna, lives with us. She will always meet, listen, feed, help with good advice. All members of our family turn to my grandmother for advice. My grandmother is the wisest and kindest. My grandmother knows everything: cooking, spinning, knitting, sewing-and she tries to teach me a lot. And how many things she grows in the summer garden! My brother and I try to help her. And now, about my brother. His name is Maxim. He is in my school in the 8th grade. Maxim is the pride of our family. He is an excellent student, plays the guitar, and actively participates in the life of the class and school. And also, he's my first assistant. Maxim accompanies me to school, to dance classes. My brother and I are never bored, he will always come up with an interesting activity.
